headline: Oracle Data Center Power Outage Disrupts TikTok For Users In US Days After App's High-Stakes Joint Venture Deal
summary: A weather-related power outage at an Oracle Corp. (NYSE:ORCL) data center caused technical disruptions for TikTok's U.S. users days after the app shifted its American operations to new U.S.-led ownership. Oracle Confirms Data Center Outage Impacted TikTok On Tuesday, Oracle told Reuters in an email statement that a temporary power outage at one of its U.S. data centers disrupted TikTok's services. headline: Oracle’s Value Is Cut In Half From 2025 Peak as AI Caution Rises
summary: The stock’s decline has erased about $463 billion in market value from a record hit on Sept. 10 after the company reported an impressive outlook for its cloud business that pointed to soaring demand for AI.  The swift decline in Oracle shares has been amplified by growing investor concern over AI as the biggest technology companies continue to pledge billions of dollars in capital expenditures to build out data centers, in some cases without a clear return on investment.  “Maybe Oracle stock got way ahead of fundamentals and now the market’s saying, alright, show me, I wanna see it.”

raw.headline: Oracle’s Value Is Cut In Half From 2025 Peak as AI Caution Rises
raw.summary: The stock’s decline has erased about $463 billion in market value from a record hit on Sept. 10 after the company reported an impressive outlook for its cloud business that pointed to soaring demand for AI.  The swift decline in Oracle shares has been amplified by growing investor concern over AI as the biggest technology companies continue to pledge billions of dollars in capital expenditures to build out data centers, in some cases without a clear return on investment.  “Maybe Oracle stock got way ahead of fundamentals and now the market’s saying, alright, show me, I wanna see it.”

headline: Oracle Approved by IHG Hotels & Resorts as a Property Management Provider
summary: Oracle OPERA Cloud hospitality platform has been approved by IHG Hotels & Resorts (IHG) as a cloud-based property management system (PMS) for its estate in the Americas, and EMEAA (Europe, Middle East, Africa, and Asia) regions. With this approval, Oracle joins IHG's exclusive list of approved property management systems, enabling franchisees and hotel owners to make tech decisions that best suit their individual business needs.

headline: Oracle TikTok Deal Recasts Cloud Role And Data Oversight Risks
summary: Oracle, NYSE:ORCL, has finalized its investment and operational role in a new U.S.-based TikTok joint venture. The agreement expands Oracle's responsibilities for storing and securing TikTok's U.S. user data. Oracle will help oversee data, algorithms, and content safeguards under U.S. regulatory requirements. Oracle enters this new arrangement with TikTok as an already large enterprise software player that now gains direct exposure to a major consumer platform. The shares last closed at...
